LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures is another title from the studio Traveller's Tales that have uraczyÃ…â€šo us games LEGO Star Wars . After learning the history of Star Wars is time for adventures the most famous archaeologist in the history of cinema. The gameplay is very similar to what we saw in previous productions , embedded in the realities of Star Wars .

LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures is an adventure game . The easiest way to compare it to a platformer , but it also contains elements of other genres . You play the role of the title character and stagger through the levels, expounding on the occasion of the enemies encountered along the way . The whole world is built from the renowned Danish bricks that it is opportune to collect , smashing encountered objects. Established here for the first three movies with the famous hunter adventures starring : Raiders of the Lost Ark , Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom and Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade . Fans easily recognize specific places and moments that viewed in the late eighties and early nineties on the silver screen . There were , among others, the memorable scene in which Indiana Jones running away from the big , rolling ball in his direction .

Developers tried to play in the best way indulged atmosphere of the movies . The character that you control has , of course, unique to the title character 's arsenal of weapons , including the iconic whip and a gun. In the background accompanies naturally known to all fans of music, with a distinctive theme to the forefront. Although the characters in the game can not talk , the creators have entered the intervening scenes many comic gags , to which we have become accustomed in the LEGO Star Wars series .
